message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It offers unparalleled value and can significantly enhance your operations. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you for $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a high-quality asset at a competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for presenting your product. While I acknowledge its value, I find the asking price a bit steep. I'm prepared to offer $650,000 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and understand your position. In order to accommodate your budget while still ensuring fair compensation for our efforts and investment, we are willing to consider a price of $800,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects a balance between value and cost, and we hope it aligns better with your expectations.
